title: Savory Foods Recalls Pork Rinds Due To Misbranding and Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Sept. 10, 2016 Savory Foods, a Portsmouth, OH establishment, is recalling approximately 32,928 pounds of pork rind products due to misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The product contains wheat, a known...
